DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether renal team involvement early at the onset of kidney injury will prevent further developement of more severe renal failure and worse hospitalization outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Early Renal Involvement on the Development of Severe In-hospital Renal Failure
DOC.criteria: Hospitalized, elevation in creatinine meeting definition CDK5, ESRD,solid organ transplant
